text: Chakradhar Gilla (known as Chakri) (15 June 1974 – 15 December 2014) was an Indian music composer and singer. He works for Tollywood movies. He won the Filmfare Award for Best Male Playback Singer – Telugu for the movie Satyam (2003). His song named "O Maguva Nee Sneham Kosam" from his movie "Satyam" was thought to be his best known work. Chakri was born in Mahabubabad, Telangana. Chakri died from a heart attack in Hyderabad, Telangana, aged 40.Untimely demise of Chakri due to heart attack Takkari.net sumukha sir 15 December 2014 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1974 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Indian singers Category:Indian composers
title: Chakri
